entity.Name: Ragtime Player Safe Point (Chosen on each switch depending on which dances are selected, can overlap dances)

checkbox.Name: Center Pinecone
checkbox.tooltip: Spawn an extra pinecone that will stay in the center during attack formation

checkbox.Name: Counter Clockwise
checkbox.tooltip: The direction that pinecones will spin. Uncheck for clockwise

checkbox.Name: Die when alone
checkbox.tooltip: Ragma will die when it's no longer connected to anything

spinner.Name: Count
spinner.tooltip: Number of locusts (Defaults to 5 if set to 0)
